mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS CNT FROM TEST01_FOOD WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{f_keyword}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{f_keyword}||'%'
AND ID LIKE '%'||#{f_keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST01_FOOD(FOOD_SEQ, ID, TITLE, TOTAL_CNT, JOIN_CNT, MEETINGDAY, CONTENT, WDATE, READ_CNT, LIKE_CNT, LOCAL) VALUES(SEQ_FOOD.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{total_cnt}, 1, #{meetingDay}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, #{local})
mapper.select: SELECT F.FOOD_SEQ, F.ID, F.TITLE, F.TOTAL_CNT, F.JOIN_CNT, F.MEETINGDAY, F.CONTENT, F.WDATE, F.READ_CNT, F.LIKE_CNT, F.LOCAL , A.FULLNAME FROM TEST01_FOOD F, TEST01_ATTACH A WHERE F.FOOD_SEQ=A.FOOD_SEQ AND F.FOOD_SEQ=#{food_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST01_ATTACH(FULLNAME, FOOD_SEQ, RDATE) VALUES (#{fullname}, SEQ_FOOD.CURRVAL, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO TEST01_JOIN(JOIN_SEQ, ID, FOOD_SEQ) VALUES (SEQ_JOIN.NEXTVAL, #{id}, SEQ_FOOD.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_SEQ, ID, CONTENT, REF, STEP, DEPTH, WDATE, DEL, FOOD_SEQ FROM TEST01_REPLY WHERE FOOD_SEQ=#{food_seq} ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC
